entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 15.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this morning then cloudy. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers or thunderstorms. High 19 except 13 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Showers or thunderstorms. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 late in the morning. High 19 except 13 near Lake Erie. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
